org.pepstock.charba.client.utils.toast.IsDefaultAction

    Package Description
    org.pepstock.charba.client.utils.toast
    Contains all classes to use Toaster utility.

    • Uses of IsDefaultAction in org.pepstock.charba.client.utils.toast

      Classes in org.pepstock.charba.client.utils.toast that implement IsDefaultAction 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Action
      Configures style of the toast actions.
      class  ActionItem
      Defines user action to show on a toast in order to enable the user to act with the toast.
      private static class  ImmutableToastOptions.DefaultActionsValues
      Class which implements the defaults for actions
      private static class  ToastItemOptions.WrapperAction
      Is a wrapper of ActionItem in order to exposes only "get" methods.
